CustomField.description: Specify custom Payment Frequency with it's Payment Interval
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Construct JSON like {"Payment Frequency":{"Months":1,"Days":1}}. Payment Frequency is the custom Frequency API Name. The order of Months and Days dictates summing order. There needs to be a key of Months or Days. No support for Years key.
CustomField.label: Custom Payment Frequency
